ふう。今日もいい天気だな……\nさて、何をして過ごすか。:
Phew. The weather's nice today...
Now, what should I do to pass the time?
そーぞーどおり、暇そうって感じのバカヅラしてるじゃん！\n今からラミをメイズに連:
That's right, you're acting like an idiot who has nothing better to do!
Take Rami to Mayse now! And take her with you!
は！？ 唐突になんだ？: Huh?! What's this all of a sudden?
ラミ、タツミヤ鉱をいっぱい発掘して、いっぱい稼ぎたいの！\nでも、ひとりじゃ許可:
Rami, I want to dig up lots of Tatsumiya Ore and make lots of money!
But I can't get permission on my own, and I need you!
%usernameusernameuserna%は生徒会所属だから、\nメイズ探:
%usernameusernameuserna% belongs to the student council, so...
It's easy to get permission to search for Maze, isn't it?
簡単ではないけど、まぁ多分普通よりかはな。\nでも、めるや他のメンバーはどうした:
It's not easy, but, well, it's probably better than normal.
But what happened to the other members?
今日みんな用事あるんだって。\nだからしょーきょほーでおまえってなわけ。:
Everyone has something to do today.
That's why I'm calling you 'you'.
頼ってきて『消去法』とは、酷い言い草だな……: Relying on the process of elimination? That's a terrible thing to say...
こんな美少女に頼られて、おまえめっちゃラッキーじゃん！: You're so lucky to be relied on by such a beautiful girl!
自分で美少女言うな！ 否定はしないけど！: Don't call yourself a pretty girl! I won't deny it, though!
……で！ 一緒に行くの！？ 行かないの！？: ...So! Are you going with me!? Are you not going!?
おー！ さっすが！ そうこなくっちゃ！: Oh! That's right! That has to be it!
金とんのかよ！？ 金ないからメイズ行きたいのに！: What's with the money?! I don't have any money, so I wanna go to Maze!
……冗談だ。まあ、暇してたし、付き合ってもいいよ。: ...I'm kidding. Well, I was free, so I don't mind going out with you.
最初からそう言えっての！: I told you to say that from the start!
にしても、ラミって、金儲けが好きだよな。: Still, Rami really likes to make money.
は？ なんか文句でもあんの？\n金儲けなんてみんな好きでしょ？:
Huh? You got a problem with that?
Everyone likes making money, don't they?
まあ、それはそうなんだが……\n稼いだ分いつもどこに使ってるんだ？:
Well, that's true, but...
Where do you always use what you earned?
え……それは……\n弟や妹に、もっといい暮らしをさせてあげたいし……:
Huh...? Well...
I want my brother and sister to have a better life...
わかった。わかったから、手を引っ張るな。\nまったく、困ったやつだな……:
Okay. I get it, don't pull my hand.
Honestly, what a troublesome guy...
で？ なんで許可取れた探索可能範囲が、\n地穴帯のそれもめっちゃ浅い層だけなの！:
So? Why did I get permission to explore the area?
It's just a really shallow layer of earth?!
ほとんど掘り尽くされているじゃん！\nもっと深いところはだめなの！？:
It's almost all dug up!
Can't we go deeper?!
ふたりだけだから、浅い層しか許可が出なかったんだろ。: It was just the two of them, so they probably only got permission from the shallow stratum.
はー。 生徒会、頭固すぎ。: *sigh* The Student Council is too stubborn.
まあ、許可が出ただけましだと思うんだな。\n浅い層でも、タツミヤ鉱が見つかること:
Well, I think it's better to just get permission.
You can find Tatsumiya Ore even in the shallow levels.
以前のめるみたいなラッキーはそうないっての。\nったく、仕方ないなぁ……:
That's what it means to be lucky like before.
Geez, there's no helping it...
……ラミ、どうだ？ 少しは出たか？: ...Rami, what do you think? Did you come out a little?
全然出ないっての！ わかってたけど！: It's not coming out at all! I knew that!
まあ、ここら辺は何度も掘った後だからな。\nさすがにもう大きいのは、出てこないか:
Well, I've dug around here many times, after all.
I don't think the big ones will come out anymore.
じゃあ、なんのためにラミは、ここに来たのよ？\nタダ働きするために来たわけじゃな:
Then why did Rami come here?
I didn't come here to work for free!
仕方ないだろ。これ以上、深く潜るのは危険なんだ。: I can't help it. It's dangerous to dive any deeper than this.
おい、ラミ。どこに行くつもりだ？\nそっちは、許可された範囲じゃないぞ。:
Hey, Rami. Where are you going?
That's not something you're allowed to do.
ちょっとだけ深い場所に行ってみるだけ。\n少しなら大丈夫っしょ。:
I'm just going to go somewhere a little deeper.
It should be fine if it's just a little.
単独で深い場所に行くのは危険だ。\nだいたい、許可範囲から出るのは違反行為だ。:
It's dangerous to go deep on your own.
In the first place, getting out of the range of permission would be a violation.
わかってるっつの、そんくらい。\nでも、いつまでもここにいても、何も出てこないじ:
I know that much.
But no matter how long we stay here, nothing will come out!
だったら、少しくらい危険でも深い場所に行った方がましでしょ！: In that case, even if it's a little dangerous, it'd be better to go somewhere deep!
もし何かあったらどうするつもりだ？: What are you gonna do if something happens?
ラミの腕なら、多少危険なことがあっても平気よ。: With Rami's skills, she'll be fine even if something dangerous happens.
そういう意味じゃない。違反をすれば、お前だけじゃない。\nチームにも迷惑がかかる:
That's not what I meant. If you violate it, you won't be the only one.
You'll cause trouble for the team, too.
本当にそれでもいいのか？: Are you really okay with that?
……ふぅ。わかった、引き返せばいいんでしょ。\nちょっと言ってみただけだっての。:
...Phew. All right, I just have to turn back, right?
I was just trying to say it.
ふたりに来てもらったのは、他でもありません。: It was none other than the two of them who came.
昨日、あなた方のＭＧが許可範囲外に出たことが確認されました。\n理由を説明をして:
Yesterday, it was confirmed that your MG was outside the range of permission.
Why don't you explain why?
（寸前で止めたつもりだったが、\nやっぱ少しはみ出てしまっていたか……）:
(I thought I stopped her just in time, but...
I guess it really did stick out a little...)
ちょっとくらいいいじゃん。\nあんな浅いところで掘っても、何も出てこなかったんだ:
It's fine if it's just a little.
After all, even after digging in such a shallow place, nothing came out.
おい、ラミ。そんな言い方はよせ。: Hey, Rami. Don't say it like that.
だって、そうでしょ？ あんな浅いところで、いくら頑張っても、\n何も出てこないの:
I mean, isn't that right? No matter how hard you try in such a shallow place,
There's no way she'd keep digging when nothing's coming out.
それに範囲外から出たのは、ちょっとだけだし、\nすぐに戻ってきたじゃん。:
Besides, I only came out of range a little,
You came right back.
ラミさん。あなたは何もわかっていないようですね。\nもし何かあれば、大変な問題に:
Rami, you don't seem to understand anything.
If something had happened, it could have been a serious problem.
自分が言いだした: I'm the one who suggested it.
一体、どちらが違反行為を行おうと言い出したのですか？: Which one of you suggested you commit a crime?
は？ ちょっと、勝手なこと言わないで。\n言い出したのも、違反したのもラミよ。:
Huh? Hey, don't be so selfish.
Rami was the one who suggested it and violated it.
会長、今回のは俺の監督不行き届きが原因です。\n大変申し訳ありませんでした！:
Pres, this is my fault for not directing properly.
I'm terribly sorry!
……わかりました。今回だけは大目に見ましょう。\nラミさんは常習犯でもないですし:
...Understood. Just this once, I'll overlook it.
Rami-san isn't a habitual criminal, so we'll be on high alert.
では、ラミさん。あなたはもう帰っていいですよ。: Rami-san, you can go home now.
……あなたは残ってくれるかしら？\n話はまだ終わっていません。:
...Will you stay behind?
I'm not done talking yet.
あなたには指揮官の責務について、\nもう一度伝えなければいけないようですね。:
You have a duty as a commander,
Looks like I'll have to tell you again.
まさか、罰として演習場をずっと走らされることになるとは……\n何時間も走らされて:
I didn't think I'd be forced to run all the way through the training grounds as punishment...
After being forced to run for hours, my legs are already shaking...
早く帰って、風呂に入って寝たい……: I want to go home, take a bath, and go to bed...
うわっ、ダッサー。ちょっと驚かしただけで転ぶなんて。\n足もガクガクさせちゃって:
Whoa, Dasser. You tripped just from being surprised.
Her legs are shaking, too. She's like a newborn fawn!
ったく、誰のせいだと思ってるんだよ。\nだいたい、なんでこんなところにいるんだ？:
Geez, whose fault do you think it is?
Why am I even here in the first place?
もちろん、ボロボロの%usernameusernameuserna%を見物しに。:
Of course, I came to see the worn-out %usernameusernameuserna%.
He's even weaker than I thought, and he's super funny!
ん……？ ということは俺をずっと待ってたってことか？: Hm...? Does that mean she's been waiting for me this whole time?
ってか、それより！\nなんで%usernameusernameuserna%が罰:
Wait, more importantly!
Why is %usernameusernameuserna% being punished?
チームの責任を取るのが、指揮官の役目だからな。: It's a commander's duty to take responsibility for the team.
はあ？ 何格好つけちゃってるのよ？\n倒れたまま、立ち上がれないくせに……:
Huh? What are you trying to look cool for?
You can't even stand up on the ground...
……まあ、迷惑をかけて悪かった。\nラミのせいで、罰を受けちゃって。:
...Well, I'm sorry for causing you trouble.
I was punished because of Rami.
珍しく殊勝な態度じゃないか。\nさては、ラミの皮を被ったメイズシフターだな。:
Isn't that an admirable attitude for once?
Now it's time for the lamia skinned maise shifter.
はあ？ このラミ様をなんだと思ってるわけ！？: Huh? What do you think this Rami-sama is?!
はは、冗談だ……ラミが気にすることじゃない。\n罰を受けたのも、俺の監督不行き届:
Haha, just kidding... It's nothing for Rami to worry about.
It's only natural that she was punished because I wasn't supervising her properly.
……なんで笑ってるのよ？ ラミが迷惑をかけたのに……\n普通なら、怒って当然でし:
...Why are you smiling? Rami caused you so much trouble...
Under normal circumstances, wouldn't it be natural for you to be angry?
%usernameusernameuserna%って、ほんとお人好しよね……\n:
%usernameusernameuserna% really is a softie...
Megumo Shichika, everyone on the team... They're all softhearted.
ラミに恩を着せても、なんの得にもならないってのに。: There's nothing to gain from making Rami indebted to me.
ラミの家は貧乏だし、ラミは世の中金がすべてだと思ってるし、\nチームは稼ぐために:
Rami's family is poor, and Rami thinks money is everything in the world
We're only thinking about whether we can use the team to make money...
そんなラミによくみんな優しくできるよね。呆れるわ。: How can you all be so kind to a Rami like that? I'm amazed.
みんながラミに優しくするのは、それだけの子じゃない――\n本当は優しいって知って:
It's not just that girl that everyone's nice to Rami—
It's because I know you're actually kind.
ラ、ラミが優しい？ 冗談でしょ？: R-Rami is kind? Are you kidding me?
そうじゃなきゃ、こんな時間まで俺を待っててくれないだろ？\n俺のことを心配して、:
If you hadn't, you wouldn't have waited for me at this hour, would you?
You've been waiting for me this whole time out of concern for me, haven't you?
……べ、別に心配してたわけじゃないし。\n罰を受けて、ボロボロになったのを笑いた:
...I-It's not like I was worried or anything.
I just wanted to laugh at how torn up I was after being punished.
その全部わかってますって顔やめてよ。\nクソザコのくせに、生意気だっつの。:
Stop making a face that says you know all of that.
You're a shithead, but you're so cheeky.
口ではそう言うが……顔真っ赤だぞ？: You say that, but... your face is bright red.
う、うっさいなぁ！\nいつか覚えておきなさいよ……！:
Sh-Shut up!
You'll have to remember this someday...!
――なんて、照れ隠しかガミガミ言う彼女とともに、\n俺は帰路へとついたのだった。:
She's trying to hide her embarrassment.
I headed home.
